solution_line_template: Moksi took DJ Snake and his fiancee to a luxurious hotel for {num_nights} nights at ${cost_per_night} per night, for a total of {num_nights}*${cost_per_night} = $<<{num_nights}*{cost_per_night}={moksi_hotel_cost}>>{moksi_hotel_cost}

If Lil Jon also bought them a car worth ${lil_jon_car_value}, the value of the treats from Lil John and Moksi summed up to ${moksi_hotel_cost}+${lil_jon_car_value} = $<<{moksi_hotel_cost}+{lil_jon_car_value}={total_moksi_lil_jon}>>{total_moksi_lil_jon}

Wynter presented them with a house worth four times the value of the car Lil Jon bought them, a total of {wynter_multiplier}*${lil_jon_car_value} = $<<{wynter_multiplier}*{lil_jon_car_value}={wynter_house_value}>>{wynter_house_value}

The total value of all the treats DJ Snake received on his engagement day is ${wynter_house_value}+${total_moksi_lil_jon} = $<<{wynter_house_value}+{total_moksi_lil_jon}={total_treats_value}>>{total_treats_value}
